newReleases.title: Avatar
newReleases.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

newReleases.title: Inception
newReleases.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

newReleases.title: The Dark Knight
newReleases.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

mostlyWatched.title: The Shawshank Redemption
mostlyWatched.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

classics.title: Casablanca
classics.description: In Casablanca in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate encounters a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

popularSeries.title: Breaking Bad
popularSeries.description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer faces moral dilemmas and dangerous adversaries.

newSeries.title: The Mandalorian
newSeries.description: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.
